name: PhotophoBoy
description:
PhotophoBoy

Submission for #WeeklyGameJam (Week 144)

Theme : In The Dark

A short retro platformer with grayscale VGA resolution and minimal concept. Be afraid of lights to survive. Dark is your friend, advance through it or you will die.

CONTROLS:

Arrows to move.

Space to Jump.

Gamepad is recommended for better gaming experience.

Don't forget to support this game to make it biggest and improve it with cool new features. Thanks.
